response.overview: An introduction to the world of Thomas – 8 adventures with Thomas!  The “My First Thomas” series is designed to be an introduction for new fans who are just embarking on their journey into the wonderful world of Thomas & Friends. Each collection focuses on one key character from the series and allows the fledgling Thomas fan to get familiar with Thomas, the Island of Sodor and all the fun adventures the friends have every day.  Episodes:  Thomas and Gordon  Thomas’ Train  Thomas and the Guard  Thomas Goes Fishing  Thomas, Terence and the Snow  Thomas and Bertie  Bertie’s Chase  Thomas Comes to Breakfast  NB: These episodes have appeared on previous ABC DVD releases.
response.tagline: An introduction to the world of Thomas!
response.title: My First Thomas with Thomas
